    Java this Keyword

    ì´ í˜ì´ì§€ë¥¼ ë²ˆì—­í•˜ë©° ê³µë¶€

    public class Point {
  public int x = 0;
  public int y = 0;

  //ìƒì„±ì Constructor
  public Point(int a, int b) {
    x = a;
    y = b;
  }
}

    ìœ„ì˜ ì‘ì„±ëœ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ë³´ë©´, class â€¦ (ë‹¤ìŒì— ê³„ì†)

    public class Point {
  public int x = 0;
  public int y = 0;

  //ìƒì„±ì Constructor
  public Point(int x, int y) {
    this.x = x;
    this.y = y;
  }
}
